name: Marble Game (JimSny2)
description:
Are you looking for a puzzle-solving game involving pipes and marbles? Then this is the game for you! Marble Game is a student project, built in just a few short weeks. The objective is to reposition platforms and guide your marble through different environmental obstacles to reach the end pipe and access the next level. That's all there is to it! I hope you enjoy this beta build and I'll work with your feedback to make the game even better, happy gaming!

Features

-12 Levels with 4 Different Environments to Explore

-Sound Effects & Music for Each Level and Interaction

-New Puzzle Elements for Each Environment
